entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 3:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -20.5°C
Wind: N 23 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
